problem_text_cn: 如图,量角器外沿上有A、B两点,它们的读数分别是70°和40°,则∠1的度数()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, there are two points A and B on the outer edge of the protractor, and their readings are N_0 and N_1 respectively, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵量角器外沿上有A、B两点,它们的读数分别是70°和40°,∴∠AOB=70°-40°=30°,∴∠1=\frac{1}{2}∠AOB=\frac{1}{2}×30°=15°,故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查圆周角定理,由读数得到∠AOB的大小是解题的关键．
